an6.60:3.1: dāmena vā baddho → ārāme vā bandho (mr)
an6.60:4.4: thullaphusitako devo vassanto → thullaphusitake deve vassante (mr)
an6.60:4.5: na dāni amusmiṁ → na dānāmusmiṁ (bj); na dāni amukasmiṁ (mr)
an6.60:8.6: Tatra → tattha (bj, pts1ed) | cīrikasaddo → ciriliyasaddo (bj); ciriḷikāsaddo (cck, km); cīriḷikāsaddo (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts1ed) | antaradhāyeyya → antaradhāpeyya (sya-all, pts1ed, mr)
